Class ScreenItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScreenItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GamePiece

    public abstract class ScreenItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Constructs items to be displayed on the screen.
    Author:
    Lucie Sullivan
